articles.title: Euro 2024: William and Kate share photo of Charlotte and Louis watching final - BBC.com
articles.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales describe the England team as "an inspiration to all of us, young and old".
articles.content:
The Prince and Princess of Wales have called the England team "an inspiration to all of us, young and old" in a personal message posted on social media.
In the post, they also shared a picture of th… [+3073 chars]
